edu.ucsf.MESS

    This class implements multivariate environmental similarity surfaces (MESS) following Elith et al 2010.
    Author:
    jladau

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] rgsArgs)
        Writes raster with MESS values for each specified raster using samples in a specified biom table.
        Parameters:
        rgsArgs - Arguments. Arguments should be passed as --{argument name}={argument value}. Name-value pairs are:

        Required arguments

        • sBIOMPath [string] = Absolute path to a file containing an OTU table. File should be in BIOM format (HDF5).

        • sOutputPath [string] = Absolute path for output file. Should have a ".nc" suffix.

        • sRasterListPath [string] = Absolute path to file containing list of paths to rasters to consider. File should contain absolute paths, one path per line, with no header.

        Optional arguments: data table

        • sSampleMetadataPath [string] [OPTIONAL] = Path to text file containing sample metadata formatted according to http://biom-format.org/documentation/adding_metadata.html. For use if BIOM file does not contain metadata. Must include "id", "datetime" and "latitude", "longitude" or "x","y" fields

        • sSamplesToKeepPath [string] [OPTIONAL] = Path to file with list of samples to keep. File should contain a list of sample names.

        • sObservationsToKeepPath [string] [OPTIONAL] = Path to file with list of observations to keep. File should contain a list of observation names.

        • bCheckRarefied [boolean] [OPTIONAL] = Flag for whether to check for rarefaction. If enabled and table is not rarefied, error will be thrown. Default is true.

        • iRarefactionTotal [integer] [OPTIONAL] = Total count to which to rarefy samples.

        • sMaskPath [string] [OPTIONAL] = Absolute path to shapefile used for masking MESS maps.

        • sMaskFeature [string] [OPTIONAL] = Name of header for feature to use in masking MESS maps.

        • sMaskFeatureID [string] [OPTIONAL] = Name of feature to use for masking MESS maps.

        • sTrainingDate [string] [OPTIONAL] = Date (YYYY-MM-DD) to be used for loading training values. If left unspecified, date of sample collection is used.

        • dVert [double] [OPTIONAL] = Elevation for MESS maps for rasters that are elevation-specific. Defaults to 0.
